post.description: Using your provided key and secret request an access code, the access code has a 1h TTL.

get.description: Returns a paginated list of all events for a given address.
Returns a paginated list of all inscriptions for a given address.
Returns overall KPIs for a given address.

x-codeSamples.source:
import requests

url = 'https://api.ordinalhub.com/api/v1/address/{address}/kpi'
headers = {
    'accept': 'application/json',
    'Authorization': 'Bearer REPLACE_ACCESS_TOKEN',
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

get.description: Returns a paginated list of all available collections.
Returns the metadata, market data and inscription based on a collection slug.

x-codeSamples.source:
import requests

url = 'https://api.ordinalhub.com/api/v1/collections/{collection_slug}'
headers = {
    'accept': 'application/json',
    'Authorization': 'Bearer REPLACE_ACCESS_TOKEN'
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

get.description: Returns the metadata, market data and inscription based on a collection slug.

x-codeSamples.source:
import requests

url = 'https://api.ordinalhub.com/api/v1/collections/{collection_slug}/listings'
headers = {
    'accept': 'application/json',
    'Authorization': 'Bearer REPLACE_ACCESS_TOKEN'
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

get.description: Returns a paginated list of all sales for a given collection slug.

get.description: Returns a paginated list of all holders ranked by ownership percentage for a given collection slug.
Returns a list of the available markets with their urls.

x-codeSamples.source:

url = 'https://api.ordinalhub.com/api/v1/markets'
headers = {
    'accept': 'application/json',
    'Authorization': 'Bearer REPLACE_ACCESS_TOKEN'

get.description: Returns in-detail information about a market given the market id.

x-codeSamples.source:
import requests

url = 'https://api.ordinalhub.com/api/v1/markets/{market_id}'
headers = {
    'accept': 'application/json',
    'Authorization': 'Bearer REPLACE_ACCESS_TOKEN'
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

get.description: Returns a paginated list of all collections available on a given market.
Returns inscription metadata for a given inscription id.

x-codeSamples.source:
import requests

url = 'https://api.ordinalhub.com/api/v1/inscriptions/{inscription_id}'
headers = {
    'accept': 'application/json',
    'Authorization': 'Bearer REPLACE_ACCESS_TOKEN'
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

get.description: Returns twitter/discord data for a given collection slug
Returns either the wallet, inscription, or collection that matches the query.

parameters.description: It can be either an inscription name, number or id, collection name or a valid btc address

schema.title: Query
schema.description: It can be either an inscription name, number or id, collection name or a valid btc address

parameters.name: query

get.description: Returns a paginated list of all quadkeys for a given owner's address.

Returns a paginated list of inscription metadata for recent quadkeys.
Returns all clusters for a given parent quadkey.

parameters.description: List of parent quadkeys to cluster by.
